Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[0: The female knight comes back to her senses.
She looks to be in critical condition...
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[4: "Pleasure. I'm Jeanne... from the Kingdom of Rondon."
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[5: "I guess I have you to thank for saving me..."
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[6: "I'm Jeanne from the Kingdom of Rondon."
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[7: "Now it would be polite to introduce yourself too."
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[1: "I guess I have you to thank for saving me..."
"Really, this is how it is going to be?"
"Well thank you for saving me in any case...I guess being
polite has nothing to do with that."
"I think I remember what happened... We were getting to
the lower levels of the prison."
"There was a small party of us... We came down here to the
"We were meant to save the brother of one of our comrades.
He was serving at the dungeons of fear and hunger as the
"Several days ago we got a plea for help from the dungeons.
"Our party was scattered almost immediately when we reached
the dungeons. We were thrown in the midst of chaos right from the
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[2: "Me and the dark knight Seril ended up together and when
we couldn't find the others, we decided to delve deeper..."
"We were then ambushed by a creature with the head of a
"I have no idea what happened to Seril, but I hid in the
catacombs, only to be found by that hairy beast later
Jeanne coughs up blood. She seems to be in serious pain.
"It might be a bit too much to ask, but could you help me
reach the upper floors of the dungeon?"
"We were supposed to re-group at the basement area."
"I'm afraid I'm in a too bad a shape to get there
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[3: "I know it's a big detour from here...but..."
"I'm sure I can make it on my own too..."
"You know, I changed my mind. I don't even want your help."
Map111.Event[134].Page[2].list.message[4: "You know, I changed my mind. I don't even want your help."
Map111.Event[134].Page[3].list.message[1: "I just need to catch my breath first..."
Map111.Event[134].Page[3].list.message[2: There is a terrified look on the face of Jeanne.

Map111.Event[270].Page[1].list.message[0: You find the \c[2]King's crown\c[0] from the chest.
Map111.Event[270].Page[1].list.message[1: This crown looks very valuable and pricey. It is bound to
